SingleReadSNV.base_file_name.description: Base file name for output files. The output files will be named [base_file_name].with_ml_qual.vcf.gz

SingleReadSNV.create_md5_checksum_output.description: Create md5 checksum for requested output files

SingleReadSNV.featuremap_params.description: FeatureMap parameters, recommended value set in the template.

SingleReadSNV.features.description: Features to be used for training the SNV quality model, should match pre trained model if one is given, recommended value set in the template.

SingleReadSNV.input_cram_bam_index.description: Input CRAM or BAM index file

SingleReadSNV.min_coverage_to_train_mode.description: Minimum coverage to train the ML model, needed as label assignment (true/false SNV) is unreliable at low coverages, the recommended value is set in the template

SingleReadSNV.pre_trained_model_files.description: Pre-trained ML model json files, if provided the model will be used for inference and no self-trained model will be created. Use with care, the model must be trained on the same data type with the same features

SingleReadSNV.pre_trained_srsnv_metadata.description: Pre-trained SNV quality model metadata json file, if provided the model will be used for inference and no self-trained model will be created. Use with care, the model must be trained on the same data type with the same features

SingleReadSNV.raise_exceptions_in_report.description: Raise and exception and fail the pipeline if an error is raised in the QC report

SingleReadSNV.references.description: Reference files: fasta, dict and fai, recommended value set in the template

SingleReadSNV.single_read_snv_params.description: SingleReadSNV parameters, recommended value set in the template.

SingleReadSNV.sorter_json_stats_file.description: Sorter json stats file provided by the Ultima Genomics pipeline (same base name as the input cram/bam file with a json extension)

SingleReadSNV.training_regions_interval_.description: Genomic regions to include in the training set, the recommended value is set in the template
Index for genomic regions to exclude from the training set, the recommended value is set in the template

SingleReadSNV.xgboost_params_file.description: XGBoost parameters file for training the SNV quality model, recommended value set in the template.
